Channel Average Layer¶

Implementation of Channel Average Layer This script implement the layer of Channel Average layer as described in the following publication

A deep-learning classifier identifies patients with clinical heart failure using whole-slide images of H&E tissue Nirschl JJ, Janowczyk A, Peyster EG, Frank R, Margulies KB, et al. (2018) PLOS ONE 13(4): e0192726. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0192726

created Jalil Ahmed.

class src.ChannelAverageLayer.ChannelAverage(*args, **kwargs)¶

ChannelAverage layer is used to extract class based image-level probability from the pixel-level probabilities produced by the fully convolutional network

Nirschl et al Implementation
